titles.title: A resolution to provide for a Second World Assembly on Aging.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Human Rights and International Organizations.

bill.summary: 9/27/1988--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should instruct the U.S. delegation to the United Nations to work with the delegations of other nations to call for a World Assembly on Aging by 1992.
